price: Pra, paralajmëro (o Muhamed), sepse ti, për dhuntinë e Zotit tënd, nuk je as fallxhi, as i çmendur!
arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٖ وَلَا مَجۡنُونٍ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: fadhakkir famā anta biniʿ'mati rabbika bikāhinin walā majnūnin
